messages.content: ComfyUI Light Gradient is a set of nodes for creating light gradient effects in ComfyUI.
How can I install ComfyUI Light Gradient?

There are three ways to install ComfyUI Light Gradient: 1) Using ComfyUI Manager (recommended), 2) Cloning the GitHub repository in the ComfyUI custom_nodes directory using git, or 3) Downloading the zip file, extracting it, and copying the resulting folder to the ComfyUI custom_nodes directory. After installation, restart ComfyUI.
What are the nodes included in ComfyUI Light Gradient?
ComfyUI Light Gradient includes two nodes: Image Gradient Node and Mask Gradient Node.
What are the inputs for the Image Gradient Node?

The Image Gradient Node has six inputs: width (width of Mask), height (height of Mask), light_position (position of Light), multiplier (strength of Light), start_color (start color of gradient), and end_color (end color of gradient).
What is the output of the Image Gradient Node?
The output of the Image Gradient Node is an IMAGE.
What are the inputs for the Mask Gradient Node?
The Mask Gradient Node has four inputs: width (width of Mask), height (height of Mask), light_position (position of Light), and multiplier (strength of Light).
What is the output of the Mask Gradient Node?
The output of the Mask Gradient Node is a Mask.
